description.narrative: Output 2.2: Systems for generating evidence and monitoring are strengthened at national and sub-national levels for inclusive and equitable policies, plans and services, especially for the most disadvantaged., which contributes to Access To Justice, Access To Justice (Covid), Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children (Covid), Children With Disabilities, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: OUTCOME 2: Evidence generated for policy advocacy for inclusion in social services by 2020.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.2: Systems for generating evidence and monitoring are strengthened at national and sub-national levels for inclusive and equitable policies, plans and services, especially for the most disadvantaged.

description.narrative: National statistical information management systems are now strengthened for evidence-based policy making and decision making through transforming the MaldivInfo database into a data-for-all platform with an accompanying mobile application. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of Monitoring and Evaluation framework supported

target.value: 2020:Management Response for SP evaluation is developed

actual.value: 2020:Evaluation is completed and uploaded to the system. Developing management response is ongoing.

title.narrative: # of periodic analytical reports on key indicators and disparities
% of SDG child indicators with data
The UNICEF/Washington Group module on child functioning is used in national censuses and/or surveys

baseline.value: Washington questionnaire not applied in a survey

actual.value: 2019:Disability Washington questions were applied in an evaluation of disability scheme. Core 6 questions will be used in the Census 2021.

title.narrative: National government measurement of child poverty using multidimensional measures

actual.value: 2019:Multidimensional poverty Index is derived using DHS16/17.
